name: ConsoleWar76
description:
2020 was the year of the new next gen console, not just the virus and, many other stuff... So I tried to make a little arcade game with 3 differents character but version 0.2 is very basic yet. Was supposed to have a fall guy game, beat em all rts arena war game, carry sheep camp game. With 3 differents team, but, unfinished in time.
Move with WASD or arrow, jump with space, good luck. Hum, no Congratulation screen at the end yet.
